name: Trichloroethanol, NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (RH-hydroxylating or -epoxidizing)
definition: Trichloroethanol + 2 NADPH + 2 Oxygen + 2 H+ <=> Trichloroacetate + 2 NADP+ + 3 H2O

pathways.rn00980: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

orthologs.K07415: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily E polypeptide 1 [EC:1.14.13.-]
